entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:07 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
